name: Space Lord (primozov)
description:
Space Lord

Hey, I'm Lucas and Space Lord is my first game made with Unity, it's a top down shooter where a space guy fight some waves of enemies to survive.  It was based on the course of Blackthornprod on udemy.

Use W, A, S and D to give some impulse to the Space Lord Jet-pack, and move through gravity zero, and use the mouse and left mouse button to aim and hit enemies with the 3 types of guns available.

The sounds effects were all made by mouth and edited with Audacity, it was really fun. My wife Sarah helped me with the graphics, because I'm better at coding.

I hope you have some minutes of challenge and fun, and I hope you survive until the end of the game, witch is not that long, to be able to see the boss I've developed.

Lucas 'Primozov' Primo
